item.title: Brexit to end the NHS: Hypochondria or the real deal?
item.author: Rhiju Chatterjee,
item.description: Born in 1948, the NHS has survived through a lot. However, like many other 70 year olds, the NHS is facing multiple chronic issues that cannot be fixed with a simple operation. Patients are waiting longer and longer to see a doctor, both in GP practices and A&Es. This is due to a multitude of â€¦
